Simon Broven was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate and a former Flaming Fist mercenary in the late 15 century DR.
Simon was a human man with light brown hair, eyes, and a light skin tone.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, healer Sylbert spent his days at the Harbourview Park in the Lower City, helping Simons recovery after either suffering some trauma. The man lked to come to the Harbourview Park because of the silence he could find there. Even with Sylberts help, he still had long road to recovery ahead.
